mods.abstract: This is a WARC capture of http://retro.grinnell.edu from 03-Aug-2016.

relatedItem.note:
The following wget command sequence was initiated on 03-August-2016 from an SSH session on DGAdmin in order to capture http://retro.grinnell.edu (before its announced retirement) in WARC format.
sudo su cd /tmp export USER_AGENT="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.1; en-US) AppleWebKit/533.20.25 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/5.0.4 Safari/533.20.27" export SAVE_HOST="retro.grinnell.edu" export WARC_NAME="retro.grinnell.edu" wget \ -e robots=off --mirror --page-requisites \ --waitretry 5 --timeout 60 --tries 5 --wait 1 \ --warc-header "operator: Archive Team" --warc-cdx --warc-file="$WARC_NAME" \ -U "$USER_AGENT" "$SAVE_HOST" -l1
The â€“l1 option, at the very end of the wget command, ensures that the crawl/retrieve will not traverse too deep into the site structure (one level).
